scripts.say: We just received a message informing us that the second convoy has been attacked by Iron Blood forces.
We had already anticipated this, and it would seem that we have a shark on the hook.
Correct. We have fought her in the past, but it seems this time we'll be able to settle things for good.
But we don't stand a chance if we go up against a battleship with our firepower...
There is no need to worry. Headquarters has already taken precautions against the enemy. Duke of York should be en route to provide support.
Our mission is simply to pursue and pester the supporting Iron Blood forces until Duke of York has arrived.
Matchless, Musketeer, may I ask you to provide reconnaissance?
Now then, ladies... It's time to reel in the catch!
